messages.id: Are we alone in the Universe?
messages.message: Are we alone in the Universe?

messages.id: Estimate the number of detectable alien civilizations in the Milky Way using the Drake Equation.
messages.message: Estimate the number of detectable alien civilizations in the Milky Way using the Drake Equation.
messages.translation: Estime o número de civilizações alienígenas detectáveis na Via Láctea usando a Equação de Drake.

messages.id: to think about the size and composition of the galaxy and how it affects the possibility of intelligent life
messages.message: to think about the size and composition of the galaxy and how it affects the possibility of intelligent life
messages.translation: pensar sobre o tamanho e composição da galaxia e como afeta a possibilidade de vida inteligente

messages.id: to understand and estimate the terms of the Drake Equation
messages.message: to understand and estimate the terms of the Drake Equation
messages.translation: entender e estimar os termos da Equação de Drake

messages.id: to compare your initial guess with the final value
messages.message: to compare your initial guess with the final value
messages.translation: comparar seu palpite inicial com o valor final
